item.title: The John Marshall Law School
item.description: The John Marshall Law School, an ABA accredited law school in the South Loop of Chicago, Illinois, offers J.D., LL.M. and M.S. degrees – as well as Continuing Legal Education, or CLE – in the following programs: Advocacy and Dispute Resolution, Employee Benefits Law, Fair Housing Law, Intellectual Property Law, Information Technology and Privacy Law, International Law, Global Legal Studies, Tax Law, and Real Estate Law
